name: Time Trax
overview: Captain Darien Lambert — A Hunter Amongst Us... This game takes you into TV's most exciting new action adventure drama.. Time Trax. As Captain Darien Lambert, Fugitive Retrieval Officer, you'll travel back to today's criminal underworld to smash a ring of ruthless felons from the 22nd century. Your weapons and martial arts are now way ahead of your time. But so are the bad guys who'd like nothing better than to say, "You're history, Lambert." Get ready for a wild ride through the nation's capital [present and future] and far beyond as you track down evil scientist Mordicai Sahmbi, assassin Sepp Dietrich and other fugitives as they attempt to flee from you, from the law—and from time itself.
